annotations.normalized_text: John F. Kennedy Center For The Performing Arts
The Institute of Museum and Library Services

text:
@RepAdamSchiff When I think coronavirus relief, I think of.
$25 million John F. Kennedy Center For The Performing Arts
$75 million Corporation For Public Broadcasting
$1.2 billion to purchase expensive “renewable” jet fuel.          
$500 million to The Institute of Museum and Library Services
